commits: 013e300: fix(#287): add promptType/defaultOptionNumber fallback for prompt-response API
message: TDD implementation complete. All 17 unit tests pass (11 in prompt-response-verification, 6 in useAutoYes). ESLint and TypeScript checks pass with 0 errors. The prompt-response API now falls back to body.promptType/defaultOptionNumber when promptCheck re-verification fails, enabling cursor-key navigation for Claude Code multiple-choice prompts even in error scenarios.
